New Cder

five life jackets to throw to the new coder

APIs

Introduction to working with APIs
Part 0: Setup – Initial setup of your API environment.
Part 1: Setup of Raw Data – Grabbing raw data from publicly available information.
Part 2: Giantbomb API – Working with a publicly available API.
Part 3: JSON Parsing – Parse the response from the API call into something meaningful.
Part 4: Logic of Script – Parse the command-line arguments and create the main logic of the script flow.
Extended – Examples of APIs being used in real life, and where to go from here.
